name: Domain of Blessing: Variation I
description:
The prophet and the ruler, heroes and fell dragons, the grand opera of the golden age once played out here.
Now, the only players left on the stage are monsters of unknown provenance. You shall earn priceless Artifacts, if — and only if — you can defeat them.
disorder: When a Bond of Life gains or loses value, the character gains a 15% All Elemental and Physical DMG Bonus for 10s. This effect can stack 4 times. The duration of each stack is counted independently.
